fields.name: PIXEL_BIT
fields.description: Pixel Bit

fields.name: REDGE
fields.description: Valid Pixel Clock Edge Select

enumeratedValues.name: REDGE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Pixel data is latched at the falling edge of CSI_PIXCLK

enumeratedValues.name: REDGE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Pixel data is latched at the rising edge of CSI_PIXCLK

fields.name: INV_PCLK
fields.description: Invert Pixel Clock Input

enumeratedValues.name: INV_PCLK_0
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_PIXCLK is directly applied to internal circuitry

enumeratedValues.name: INV_PCLK_1
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_PIXCLK is inverted before applied to internal circuitry

fields.name: INV_DATA
fields.description: Invert Data Input. This bit enables or disables internal inverters on the data lines.

enumeratedValues.name: INV_DATA_0
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_D[7:0] data lines are directly applied to internal circuitry

enumeratedValues.name: INV_DATA_1
enumeratedValues.description: CSI_D[7:0] data lines are inverted before applied to internal circuitry

fields.name: GCLK_MODE
fields.description: Gated Clock Mode Enable

enumeratedValues.name: GCLK_MODE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Non-gated clock mode. All incoming pixel clocks are valid. HSYNC is ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: GCLK_MODE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Gated clock mode. Pixel clock signal is valid only when HSYNC is active.

fields.name: CLR_RXFIFO
fields.description: Asynchronous RXFIFO Clear

fields.name: CLR_STATFIFO
fields.description: Asynchronous STATFIFO Clear

fields.name: PACK_DIR
fields.description: Data Packing Direction

enumeratedValues.name: PACK_DIR_0
enumeratedValues.description: Pack from LSB first. For image data, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33, 0x44, it will appear as 0x44332211 in RX FIFO. For stat data, 0xAAAA, 0xBBBB, it will appear as 0xBBBBAAAA in STAT FIFO.

enumeratedValues.name: PACK_DIR_1
enumeratedValues.description: Pack from MSB first. For image data, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33, 0x44, it will appear as 0x11223344 in RX FIFO. For stat data, 0xAAAA, 0xBBBB, it will appear as 0xAAAABBBB in STAT FIFO.

fields.name: FCC
fields.description: FIFO Clear Control

fields.name: CCIR_EN
fields.description: BT.656 Interface Enable. This bit selects the type of interface used.

fields.name: HSYNC_POL
fields.description: HSYNC Polarity Select

fields.name: SOF_INTEN
fields.description: Start Of Frame (SOF) Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the SOF interrupt.

fields.name: SOF_POL
fields.description: SOF Interrupt Polarity. This bit controls the condition that generates an SOF interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: SOF_POL_0
enumeratedValues.description: SOF interrupt is generated on SOF falling edge

enumeratedValues.name: SOF_POL_1
enumeratedValues.description: SOF interrupt is generated on SOF rising edge

fields.name: RXFF_INTEN
fields.description: RxFIFO Full Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the RxFIFO full interrupt.

fields.name: FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN
fields.description: Frame Buffer1 DMA Transfer Done Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer1 DMA Transfer Done interrupt disable

enumeratedValues.name: FB1_DMA_DONE_INTEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer1 DMA Transfer Done interrupt enable

fields.name: FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN
fields.description: Frame Buffer2 DMA Transfer Done Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer2 DMA Transfer Done interrupt disable

enumeratedValues.name: FB2_DMA_DONE_INTEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Frame Buffer2 DMA Transfer Done interrupt enable

fields.name: STATFF_INTEN
fields.description: STATFIFO Full Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the STAT FIFO interrupt.

fields.name: SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN
fields.description: STATFIFO DMA Transfer Done Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: STATFIFO DMA Transfer Done interrupt disable

enumeratedValues.name: SFF_DMA_DONE_INTEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: STATFIFO DMA Transfer Done interrupt enable

fields.name: RF_OR_INTEN
fields.description: RxFIFO Overrun Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the RX FIFO overrun interrupt.

fields.name: SF_OR_INTEN
fields.description: STAT FIFO Overrun Interrupt Enable. This bit enables the STATFIFO overrun interrupt.

fields.name: COF_INT_EN
fields.description: Change Of Image Field (COF) Interrupt Enable

fields.name: CCIR_MODE
fields.description: BT

fields.name: PrP_IF_EN
fields.description: CSI-PrP Interface Enable

enumeratedValues.name: PrP_IF_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: CSI to PrP bus is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: PrP_IF_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: CSI to PrP bus is enabled

fields.name: EOF_INT_EN
fields.description: End-of-Frame Interrupt Enable. This bit enables and disables the EOF interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: EOF_INT_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: EOF interrupt is generated when RX count value is reached.

fields.name: EXT_VSYNC
fields.description: External VSYNC Enable

fields.name: SWAP16_EN
fields.description: SWAP 16-Bit Enable

fields.name: HSC
fields.description: Horizontal Skip Count

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_0
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_1
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_2
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_3
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_4
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_5
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_6
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_7
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_8
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: HSC_9
enumeratedValues.description: Number of pixels to skip minus 1

fields.name: VSC
fields.description: Vertical Skip Count. Contains the number of rows to skip. SCE must be 1, otherwise VSC is ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_0
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_1
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_2
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_3
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_4
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_5
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_6
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_7
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_8
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

enumeratedValues.name: VSC_9
enumeratedValues.description: Number of rows to skip minus 1

fields.name: LVRM
fields.description: Live View Resolution Mode. Selects the grid size used for live view resolution.

fields.name: BTS
fields.description: Bayer Tile Start. Controls the Bayer pattern starting point.

fields.name: SCE
fields.description: Skip Count Enable

fields.name: AFS
fields.description: Auto Focus Spread. Selects which green pixels are used for auto-focus.

enumeratedValues.name: AFS_0
enumeratedValues.description: Abs Diff on consecutive green pixels

enumeratedValues.name: AFS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Abs Diff on every third green pixels

enumeratedValues.name: AFS_2
enumeratedValues.description: Abs Diff on every four green pixels

fields.name: DRM
fields.description: Double Resolution Mode. Controls size of statistics grid.

fields.name: DMA_BURST_TYPE_SFF
fields.description: Burst Type of DMA Transfer from STATFIFO. Selects the burst type of DMA transfer from STATFIFO.

fields.name: DMA_BURST_TYPE_RFF
fields.description: Burst Type of DMA Transfer from RxFIFO. Selects the burst type of DMA transfer from RxFIFO.

fields.name: ECC_AUTO_EN
fields.description: Automatic Error Correction Enable

fields.name: ECC_INT_EN
fields.description: Error Detection Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValues.name: ECC_INT_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: No interrupt is generated when error is detected. Only the status bit ECC_INT is set.

enumeratedValues.name: ECC_INT_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Interrupt is generated when error is detected.

fields.name: ZERO_PACK_EN
fields.description: Dummy Zero Packing Enable

fields.name: SENSOR_16BITS
fields.description: 16-bit Sensor Mode

fields.name: RxFF_LEVEL
fields.description: RxFIFO Full Level

fields.name: HRESP_ERR_EN
fields.description: Hresponse Error Enable. This bit enables the hresponse (AHB protocol standard) error interrupt.

fields.name: STATFF_LEVEL
fields.description: STATFIFO Full Level

fields.name: DMA_REQ_EN_SFF
fields.description: DMA Request Enable for STATFIFO

fields.name: DMA_REQ_EN_RFF
fields.description: DMA Request Enable for RxFIFO

fields.name: DMA_REFLASH_SFF
fields.description: Reflash DMA Controller for STATFIFO

fields.name: DMA_REFLASH_RFF
fields.description: Reflash DMA Controller for RxFIFO

fields.name: FRMCNT_RST
fields.description: Frame Count Reset. Resets the Frame Counter. (Cleared automatically after reset is done)

fields.name: FRMCNT
fields.description: Frame Counter

fields.name: STAT
fields.description: Static data from sensor

fields.name: IMAGE
fields.description: Received image data

fields.name: RXCNT
fields.description: RxFIFO Count

fields.name: DRDY
fields.description: RXFIFO Data Ready

enumeratedValues.name: DRDY_1
enumeratedValues.description: At least 1 datum (word) is ready in RXFIFO.

fields.name: ECC_INT
fields.description: BT

enumeratedValues.name: ECC_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Error is detected in BT.656 coding

fields.name: HRESP_ERR_INT
fields.description: Hresponse Error Interrupt Status

fields.name: COF_INT
fields.description: Change Of Field Interrupt Status

enumeratedValues.name: COF_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Change of video field is detected.

fields.name: F1_INT
fields.description: BT

enumeratedValues.name: F1_INT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Field 1 of video is not detected.

enumeratedValues.name: F1_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Field 1 of video is about to start.

fields.name: F2_INT
fields.description: BT

enumeratedValues.name: F2_INT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Field 2 of video is not detected

enumeratedValues.name: F2_INT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Field 2 of video is about to start

fields.name: SOF_INT
fields.description: Start of Frame Interrupt Status. Indicates when SOF is detected. (Cleared by writing 1)

fields.name: EOF_INT
fields.description: End of Frame (EOF) Interrupt Status. Indicates when EOF is detected. (Cleared by writing 1)

fields.name: RxFF_INT
fields.description: RXFIFO Full Interrupt Status

fields.name: DMA_TSF_DONE_FB1
fields.description: DMA Transfer Done in Frame Buffer1

fields.name: DMA_TSF_DONE_FB2
fields.description: DMA Transfer Done in Frame Buffer2

fields.name: STATFF_INT
fields.description: STATFIFO Full Interrupt Status

fields.name: DMA_TSF_DONE_SFF
fields.description: DMA Transfer Done from StatFIFO

fields.name: RF_OR_INT
fields.description: RxFIFO Overrun Interrupt Status

fields.name: SF_OR_INT
fields.description: STATFIFO Overrun Interrupt Status

fields.name: DMA_FIELD1_DONE
fields.description: When DMA field 1 is complete, this bit will be set to 1(clear by writing 1).

fields.name: DMA_FIELD0_DONE
fields.description: When DMA field 0 is complete, this bit will be set to 1(clear by writing 1).

fields.name: BASEADDR_CHHANGE_ERROR
fields.description: When using base address switching enable, this bit will be 1 when switching occur before DMA complete

registers.name: DMASA_STATFIFO
registers.description: CSI DMA Start Address Register - for STATFIFO

fields.name: DMA_START_ADDR_SFF
fields.description: DMA Start Address for STATFIFO

registers.name: DMATS_STATFIFO
registers.description: CSI DMA Transfer Size Register - for STATFIFO

fields.name: DMA_TSF_SIZE_SFF
fields.description: DMA Transfer Size for STATFIFO

registers.name: DMASA_FB1
registers.description: CSI DMA Start Address Register - for Frame Buffer1

fields.name: DMA_START_ADDR_FB1
fields.description: DMA Start Address in Frame Buffer1

registers.name: DMASA_FB2
registers.description: CSI DMA Transfer Size Register - for Frame Buffer2

fields.name: DMA_START_ADDR_FB2
fields.description: DMA Start Address in Frame Buffer2

fields.name: FBUF_STRIDE
fields.description: Frame Buffer Parameter

fields.name: DEINTERLACE_STRIDE
fields.description: DEINTERLACE_STRIDE is only used in the deinterlace mode

fields.name: IMAGE_HEIGHT
fields.description: Image Height. Indicates how many pixels in a column of the image from the sensor.

fields.name: IMAGE_WIDTH
fields.description: This field indicates the number of active pixel cycles per line

fields.name: DEINTERLACE_EN
fields.description: This bit is used to select the output method When input is standard BT.656 video.

fields.name: PARALLEL24_EN
fields.description: Enable bit for Parallel RGB888/YUV444 24bit input

fields.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_EN
fields.description: When this bit is enabled, CSI DMA will switch the base address according to BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL rather than automatically by DMA completed

fields.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL
fields.description: CSI 2 base addresses switching method. When using this bit, BASEADDR_SWITCH_EN is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: Switching base address at the edge of the vsync

enumeratedValues.name: BASEADDR_SWITCH_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: Switching base address at the edge of the first data of each frame

fields.name: FIELD0_DONE_IE
fields.description: In interlace mode, field 0 means interrupt enabled.

fields.name: DMA_FIELD1_DONE_IE
fields.description: When in interlace mode, field 1 done interrupt enable.

fields.name: LAST_DMA_REQ_SEL
fields.description: Choosing the last DMA request condition

fields.name: BASEADDR_CHANGE_ERROR_IE
fields.description: Base address change error interrupt enable signal.

fields.name: RGB888A_FORMAT_SEL
fields.description: Output is 32-bit format.

fields.name: AHB_HPROT
fields.description: Hprot value in AHB bus protocol.

fields.name: MASK_OPTION
fields.description: These bits used to choose the method to mask the CSI input.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_0
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory (OCRAM or external DDR) from first completely frame, when using this option, the CSI_ENABLE should be 1.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_1
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory when CSI_ENABLE is 1.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_2
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory from second completely frame, when using this option, the CSI_ENABLE should be 1.

enumeratedValues.name: MASK_OPTION_3
enumeratedValues.description: Writing to memory when data comes in, not matter the CSI_ENABLE is 1 or 0.

fields.name: CSI_ENABLE
fields.description: CSI global enable signal

fields.name: DMA_RFIFO_HIGHEST_FIFO_LEVEL
fields.description: This byte stores the highest FIFO level achieved by CSI FIFO timely and will be clear by writing 8'ff to it
